author: Heather J. Cooper

review: The Fire Stick is fantastic and inexpensive.  I paid $20 to pre-order this and would really consider it at $40.  I use Apple TV in my main living room and use the Fire Stick in my bedroom, and I am happy to have both.  The only reason for 4 stars and not 5 is that as a comcast subscriber (basic bundle with Internet) I cannot use HBOGo.  There may be a few other networks I cannot use, but we will see.  My guess is that more agreements will be made and move this to 5 stars

review: This was probably the easiest connection process I've ever had. Literally plug and play! I could not connect my DirecTv to OnDemand because I either had to move my modem into the same room to manually plug it in or order their $100 device to connect. I didn't want to give them even more money than I already do so I gave the Firestick a try. I love it so far and now have HBOGo and can watch Game of Thrones whenever I want. Suck it DirecTv!
